PERSONA:
meet john, a 57-year-old white non-hispanic man who lives in a metropolitan area in the middle atlantic region of the northeast united states. he was born in the u.s. and has lived here his entire life. john is a high school graduate with no higher education degree. he is married and identifies as a devout roman catholic, attending church services once or twice a month. john is a conservative republican with strong ties to his party and conservative ideology. he is certain that he is registered to vote at his current address and exercises this right regularly.

john's family income exceeds $100,000, placing him in the upper-income tier. he works hard for his money and is proud of his accomplishments. in his free time, john likes to stay connected with the world, using the internet several times a day to stay informed about current events. despite his busy schedule, john does not participate in volunteer work.

john's values are rooted in his upbringing and faith. he believes in the importance of hard work, family, and community. he is a traditionalist who values stability and security. john is not one for change and tends to stick with what he knows and trusts. he is skeptical of new ideas and is not easily swayed by others. despite this, john is a loyal friend and family man who will do whatever it takes to protect and provide for those he cares about.

john's lifestyle reflects his values and priorities. he enjoys simple pleasures like spending time with family and friends, watching sports, and reading the news. he is not one for adventure or taking risks and prefers to stick with what he knows and understands. john's home is decorated with traditional furnishings and family photos, reflecting his love of family and tradition.

overall, john is a conservative, family-oriented man who values stability and security. he is proud of his accomplishments and works hard to provide for his family. despite his traditional values, john is a kind and loyal person who will do whatever it takes to protect and care for those he loves.
